column4: removing downloaded packages is easy, removing partially interrupted installations is quite a can of worms... which are you trying to do?
the easiest way would probably be to fully install all the packages, and then remove them using http://www.psychocats.net/ubuntu/puregnome.php
actually, the second is to remove Xubuntu.... either way, if you only want to get rid of KDE, follow the Xubuntu guideline
